options.text: Let me quickly review it and offer my thoughts.
options.analysis: You chose to review the work despite your leave, showing empathy and motivation, but could improve self-regulation.

options.text: I have full confidence in both of you. Just finalize it and send me the final version.
options.analysis: You showed trust in your colleagues and maintained boundaries, demonstrating good self-regulation, but empathy and motivation were lower.

options.text: I'm really on leave. Please handle it and I'll review it when I'm back.
options.analysis: You prioritized your leave and showed good emotional perception, but social skills could be improved.
